```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r read-data, echo=FALSE}
df <- iris
no_species <- df %>%
  select(Species) %>%
  unique() %>%
# Count() returns a df and I want an integer. So I use nrow()
  nrow()
```

Row {data-height=100}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
### Sample size

```{r valueboxes_size}
valueBox(nrow(df), caption = "Specimens measured", color = "orchid", icon = "ion-ios-flower")
```

### Species

```{r valueboxes_spec}
valueBox(no_species, caption = "Species collected", color = "orchid", icon = "fa-solid fa-heart")
```

### Our current status

``` {r}
gvalue <- 40
gauge(gvalue, min=0, max=100, 
      symbol = "Points", 
      gaugeSectors(success = c(80,100),
                   warning = c(51,79), 
                   danger = c(0,50)
                   )
      )
```
